alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 6:03PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Windham, northern Tolland, northeastern Hartford, southwestern Worcester and southeastern Hampden Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 603 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Windsor Locks, or over Windsor, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Springfield, Hartford, Enfield, Windsor, Agawam, South Windsor, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Holden, Southbridge, Auburn, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Wilbraham, Oxford and Millbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
